mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bank_account values(#{bank_account_id},#{bank_account_name},#{bank_account_number}, #{bank_account_balance},#{bank_account_type},#{bank_name},#{use_state}, CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(#{reg_date},'YYYY') < 2000 THEN SYSDATE ELSE #{reg_date} END )
mapper.select: SELECT s.statement_id, s.connected_id, s.account_id, s.reg_date, s.statement_type, s.account_value, s.approval_state, a.account_name FROM (SELECT * FROM statement WHERE connected_id=(SELECT connected_id FROM statement WHERE statement_id = #{statement_id}) AND statement_type=(SELECT statement_type FROM statement WHERE statement_id = #{statement_id})) s JOIN account a ON s.account_id = a.account_id
